summary:
HTML is the main language used to create websites. It tells web browsers how to display content, like text, images, and videos. HTML uses "tags" to mark different parts of a page, like headings or paragraphs.

It often works with CSS (design) and JavaScript (interactivity) to make websites look and function well. HTML is essential for building the structure of web pages, ensuring they are organized and easy to understand.
title: HTML
